article_title: Small Business Tax Credits For Obamacare?

article_metadata.description: With the deadline for Obamacare enrollment at the end of this month, you are probably getting some questions from employees. Perhaps the most common one is:  Will you offer insurance? Well, if so, then you may actually be eligible for a tax credit. This is much more valuable than a deduction. That [...]
